comment: The divisors of a nonzero integer are bounded by its absolute value. Theorem 1.1(i) in [ApostolNT] p. 14 (comparison property of the divides relation). (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.) (Proof shortened by Fan Zheng, 3-Jul-2016.)
